Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth more than $15000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $14000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to your needs, and I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
